test1.runOnDemand: gst-launch-1.0 videotestsrc is-live=true ! video/x-raw,width=320,height=420,framerate=30/1 ! openh264enc gop-size=20 ! video/x-h264,stream-format=byte-stream,profile=baseline ! rtspclientsink location=rtsp://127.0.0.1:8554/test1
